name: Knight Throde
description:
The Capital has undertaken a sudden attack by the Dragon! Princess Kiki was kidnapped and prisoned in the Dragon Castle. The king sent troops to the west coast to rescue the princess, but a rebel rose in the Capital. It turned out that the king's younger brother plotted a mutiny and drove the king out of the city. The assault of the Dragon and the Capital mutiny are not accidental- some bigger conspiracies seem to be hidden in the dark.
Knight Throde from the South decided on his sole journey to the Dragon Castle, trying to help rescue the princess Kiki. During their search for King, Throde and Kiki made more friends...

Features

Ingenious combination of platform jumping and brisk fighting.

Different maps to play with, multiple heroes to choose from, various monsters to be collected!

Lovely hand-drawn style.

Adventure mode: explore castles, caves, graveyards, snow mountains... and rescue trapped heroes! You will expand your team during this journey!

Endless mode: platform jumping combined with tower defense mechanism to create new experience! In this mode, build your powerful defense and clear invaders!
